import React, { Component } from 'react' import DashBoardNavBar from '../DashBoardNav/DashBoardNavBar'; import profile from '../../assets/img/undraw_profile_pic_ic5t.svg' import './DashBoard.css' class DashBoard extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { data:{ firstname : 'Ayooluwa', profilepic: profile, daysremaining: 10, daysavailable: 21, timeofftypes: [ 'Holiday', 'Maternity Leave', 'Paternity Leave', 'Sick Leave (Up to 10 Days)' ], manager: 'Mr Mayowa', department: 'Software Development' } } } render(){ const timeOffTypes = this.state.data.timeofftypes; let offTypes = timeOffTypes.map( (type, index) =>
  • {type}
    • ); return(

    Welcome {this.state.data.firstname}

    Statistics

    {this.state.data.daysremaining}

    Days remaining out of {this.state.data.daysavailable} available days.

    Used So Far
    • Holiday: 10
    • Sick Leave: 1 out of 10
    Available Types
      {offTypes}
    Details
    • Manager: {this.state.data.manager}
    • Department: {this.state.data.department}
    Calender
    All Absences
    Type Deducted Dates Approved by Status
    1 Mark Otto @mdo @twitter @twitter
    2 Jacob Thornton @fat @twitter @twitter
    3 Larry the Bird @twitter @twitter @twitter
    4 Larry the Bird @twitter @twitter @twitter
    5 Larry the Bird @twitter @twitter @twitter
    ) } } export default DashBoard;
